name: El Pacha Suites Sharm - Sanafir Hotel
description: When you stay at El Pacha Suites Sharm - Sanafir Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be near the airport, just steps from Naama Bay and Naama Bay Beach. This beach bed & breakfast is 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Ras Mohamed National Park and 6.6 mi (10.6 km) from Ras um Sid. Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities, which include an outdoor pool. Additional amenities at this Mediterranean bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the bed & breakfast's coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink from the beach bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and bidets.
address: Malek Al Bahrein,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Viva Sharm
description: With a stay at Viva Sharm Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be a 3-minute drive from Red Sea and 5 minutes from Naama Bay. This spa hotel is 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Naama Bay Beach and 8 mi (12.8 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Viva Sharm Hotel, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 110 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars.
address: Motels St,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Rafiki Hostels - Dahab
description: With a stay at Rafiki Hostels - Dahab in Dahab, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Dahab Beach and Dahab Lagoon. This spa hostel is 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Asala Beach and 3.6 mi (5.8 km) from Dahab Bay. Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. Additional amenities at this hostel include complimentary wireless internet access, a communal living room, and tour/ticket assistance. At Rafiki Hostels - Dahab, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and refrigerator in a common area. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 45 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected.
address: Peace Road, Dahab Villa 2, Land 24,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Golden Europe Hotel
description: With a stay at Golden Europe Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Dahab, within a 10-minute drive of Dahab Beach and Dahab Lagoon. This beach bed & breakfast is 1.4 mi (2.2 km) from Asala Beach and 3.6 mi (5.8 km) from Dahab Bay. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This bed & breakfast also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Enjoy international cuisine at The Roof, a beachfront restaurant which features an ocean view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 11:30 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring MP3 docking stations and minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Lighthouse Road,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jewel Sharm El Sheikh Hotel
description: With a stay at Jewel Sharm El Sheikh Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be just steps from Naama Bay and 8 minutes by foot from Naama Bay Beach. This hotel is 4 mi (6.4 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre and 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Shark's Bay. Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access and a picnic area. At Jewel Sharm El Sheikh Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 guestrooms. Conveniences include electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Naama bay Sharm El Sheikh Red Sea Governorate, Sharm Al Shiekh,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Falcon Hills Hotel
description: With a stay at Falcon Hills Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Naama Bay and Naama Bay Beach. This beach hotel is 8 mi (12.9 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre and 8.5 mi (13.7 km) from Shark's Bay. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Stop by the hotel's restaurant, Bedwin Cafe, for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 133 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.
address: Motels Street - Ras Um el Sid,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. Grab a bite at Heliodoro restaurant, one of the resort's 6 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. This resort has 5597 square feet (520 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 4 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. name: DoubleTree by Hilton Sharm El Sheikh - Sharks Bay Resort
description: Set against the stunning backdrop of Tiran Island in Sharks Bay, DoubleTree by Hilton Sharm El Sheikh is Egypts first DoubleTree property, offering an unforgettable Red Sea experience. The resort is uniquely designed with two distinct areas. Beachside, featuring 252 rooms, this section offers direct access to the sea and spectacular views, perfect for a relaxing getaway. Mountainside, boasting 318 rooms, this area combines comfort and privacy with scenic mountain vistas. Spanning an impressive 10,000 square meters, the resort offers a diverse range of 11 food and beverage outlets, catering to global tastes and culinary preferences within a selection of authentic a la carte restaurants from around the globe. Full water features experience of eight pools, water slides, and heated pools in winter. Whether its the tranquility of the mountains or the allure of the beach, DoubleTree by Hilton Sharm El Sheikh is the ultimate escape for all types of travelers.
address: Ra's Nasrani, Sharks Bay, Concourd Hotel Entrance,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & Spa
description: Whether you are visiting Sharm El Sheikh for business or leisure, Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & Spa will welcome you to the Al Pasha Coast with spacious rooms and suites, luxury amenities and superb service. Our hotel grants guests access to private beach and snorkeling of a stunning coral reef, and is also close to the city of Dahab, the nightlife of Na'ama Bay and Tiran Island. Recharge in spacious rooms and suites that feature indulgent bedding, marble bathrooms, ample desks, Wi-Fi and terraces revealing garden, pool and sea views. Take the plunge in our sparkling outdoor pools, work out in the gym and pamper yourself at our spa. Savor delicious fare at our on-site bars and restaurants, many boasting fantastic views. Event planners value our elevated indoor ballroom and meeting rooms, as well as the lovely terrace and beach spaces. Every venue is expertly supported by our events team, catering staff and AV technology. A charming stay awaits at Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & Spa.
address: Al Pasha Coast, Sharm Al Shiekh,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jaz Dahabeya
description: Dahab is a low key resort on the Red Sea. A destination with a difference.It has a strong independent vibe penchant for hooking independent travelers. In short it is the perfect location for Jaz Collection hotels. Jaz Dahabeya is a four star hotel fronting a natural lagoon on the Red Sea. From here it is only an hours drive to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport. It is easy to access well developed and not as bustling as some other Red Sea resorts.The hotel location is unbeatable. Guestrooms feature views of the sea Sinai Mountains pool and the gardens. The setting is stunning and conditions are ideal for a variety of water sports especially diving and windsurfing. Egyptian style hospitality smooth service and flash facilities define the guest experience at this four-star gem.
address: Sharm El Sheikh,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Red Rock Apartments
description: Located in Dahab, Red Rock Apartments offers a huge outdoor pool. The apartment has stunning interiors with marble floors throughout and will provide you with an open plan living room with dining area, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the pool. There is a well equipped kitchen with a washing machine, dishwasher and a microwave. The marble bathroom has a bath and shower. You can enjoy pool or mountain view from the balcony. At Red Rock Apartments, Dahab you will find a hot tub and barbecue facilities. Other facilities like grocery deliveries, an ironing service and laundry facilities are offered. Activities in the surrounding area include horse riding, hiking and diving. Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is located 90 km from the property.

name: Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment
description: Featuring a patio with mountain views, a garden and barbecue facilities, Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment can be found in Sharm El Sheikh, close to Sharks Bay Beach and 2.4 km from White Knight Bay Beach. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The apartment offers a pool with sea views, beauty services and a 24-hour front desk. Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a balcony with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security. A family-friendly restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site. The area is popular for hiking, and car hire is available at the apartment. Kids pool is also available for guests at Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment. SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 5 km from Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Each is spacious and air conditioned. The Domina is 6 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and 4 km from the centre of Naama Bay. A minibus service operates for guests within the resort.
